#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t)
    {
        long long int x,y,s,n,a,d,i;
        cin>>x>>y>>s;
        n=2*s/(x+y);
        d=(y-x)/(n-5);
        a=x-2*d;
        cout<<n<<endl;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cout<<a+i*d<<" ";
        cout<<endl;
        t--;

    }

}
